summary: This is an email forwarding a news story about French prosecutors opening a preliminary investigation related to Jeffrey Epstein. It appears to be internal FBI correspondence sharing media coverage.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The central figure in the case that French prosecutors are opening a preliminary investigation about.

events.title: French prosecutors open preliminary Epstein investigation
events.description: French prosecutors open a preliminary investigation related to Jeffrey Epstein, as reported in a Washington Post story.

keyFacts: French prosecutors opened a preliminary investigation related to Jeffrey Epstein in August 2019.
The information was reported in a Washington Post article on August 23, 2019.
The document appears to be FBI internal correspondence sharing this media report.
